titleStmt.title: The glory and happines of a true Christian A sermon preached by Master Rogers at Needham in Norfolke the 28 of Iune. 1617
titleStmt.author: Rogers, John, of Chacombe.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[ones] for T. P[avier] dwelling in Iuie laine,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; D8 stained.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
